data.title: Beginner Archery Class
data.text:
Went their with my teenager for a 1 hour beginner class. This is the first time we both did that. We had fun.

Staff are decent. The equipment and venue is good. It is indoor. Not a big place but big enough for beginners to practice.

The teaching is about 20 minutes. Getting equipment fitted took ~5 minutes. You should be shooting your first arrow within 30 minutes. The coach will then leave you alone.

I felt like a little too brief. I would prefer if they stay behind and give a couple of advice or tips. May be they want you to come back for that.

Price is a little higher than the ones in Gilroy and Union City. But we didn't use the other two due to schedule.

Parking is very limited. Well, it is Daly City.
